name: Toby And the Lost Bones
description:
You play as a small dog called Toby as he searches for his lost bones there are 4 bones on each level and to finish the level you must reach the doghouse.

You have 3 hearts that deplete with hitting an enemy after 3 hit it's game over falling to the floor is an automatic game over

use arrow keys to move

use space bar to jump
